info:
Researchers of the Alien Research Institute (ARI) have found a quilt inside a long time ago crashed spaceship, recently discovered in the Colombian mountains. They believe it indicates the replacement process to apply to a strip quilt. Depending on the resulting strip, the alien race could determine if a subsequent message was sent by them (if the resulting of repeatedly replacing patterns is a â€“ or @(-) remnant) or not.

The program simulates the alien decodification process.

Use apply button, with command alien(X), for tracing the decodification process.
coder:
replace(Y|X, X, Z) = Y | Z
replace(Y|H, X, Z) = replace(Y, X, Z) | H

l = @(/)
m = @(@(l))
a=@(<)
b=@(a)
c=@(b)
v = @(-)

alien(X) = replace(X, l|v|<|v|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|v|<|-|/, -)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|-|<|v|/, -)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|-|<|-|/, -)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|v|a|v|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|v|a|-|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|-|a|v|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|-|a|-|/, -)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|v|b|v|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|v|b|-|/, -)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|-|b|v|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|-|b|-|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|v|c|v|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|v|c|-|/, -)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|-|c|v|/, -)
alien(X) = replace(X, l|-|c|-|/, v)
alien(X) = replace(X, m|l|v|/, -)
alien(X) = replace(X, m|l|-|/, v)

decoder(X) = decoder(alien(X))
decoder(X) = X
